```{r}

library(gtrendsR)

# Run the Google Trends query
HarrisTrumpElection <- gtrends(
  c("Trump", "Harris", "election"), 
  time = "2024-01-01 2024-10-01"
)

# Extract interest over time
Harris_Trump_Election_interest_over_time <- HarrisTrumpElection$interest_over_time

# Split the data by search terms
trump_data <- subset(Harris_Trump_Election_interest_over_time, keyword == "Trump")
harris_data <- subset(Harris_Trump_Election_interest_over_time, keyword == "Harris")
election_data <- subset(Harris_Trump_Election_interest_over_time, keyword == "election")

# Plot the data
par(family = "serif")  # Use a generic serif font
plot(
  trump_data$date, trump_data$hits, 
  type = "l", col = "blue", 
  xlab = "Date", ylab = "Search Interest", 
  main = "Google Trends: Trump, Harris, and Election",
  lwd = 2  # Line width
)

# Add Harris data (red line)
lines(
  harris_data$date, harris_data$hits, 
  col = "red", lwd = 2
)

# Add Election data (green line)
lines(
  election_data$date, election_data$hits, 
  col = "green", lwd = 2
)

# Add a legend
legend(
  "topright", legend = c("Trump", "Harris", "Election"), 
  col = c("blue", "red", "green"), lty = 1, lwd = 2
)

```
